sentence.Network_en: The government will provide relief for us when are old and decrepid.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们成为老年人和贫困人群时,政府将提供援助.

auth_sentence.content: How can you be so good to an old decrepid man?
auth_sentence.res_content: How can you be so good to an old decrepid man?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How can you be so good to an old decrepid man?

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
